tool_description: Started as a reimplementation of the open source Plivo Framework (now discontinued), Eqivo Telephony API simplifies the integration between web applications and voice-enabled endpoints, such as traditional phone lines (PSTN), VoIP phones, webRTC clients etc.
name: Eqivo Telephony
title: Eqivo Telephony

api_list.name: /v0.1/RecordStop/
api_list.description: Stops the recording of a given call

required_parameters.name: RecordFile
required_parameters.description: Full path to recording file, as returned by RecordStart; `all` shorthand is also available

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceRecordStop/
api_list.description: Stops a conference recording

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

required_parameters.name: RecordFile
required_parameters.description: Full path to recording file, as returned by ConferenceRecordStart; `all` shorthand is also available

enum: Conference RecordStop Failed -- Conference not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/CancelScheduledHangup/
api_list.description: Cancels a scheduled hangup for a call

required_parameters.name: SchedHangupId
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier returned when scheduled hangup was originally requested

enum: Scheduled Hangup Cancelation Failed -- ID not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/SchedulePlay/
api_list.description: Schedules media playback for a specific call

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call to play media into

required_parameters.name: Sounds
required_parameters.description: Comma separated list of file paths/URIs to be played

required_parameters.name: Time
required_parameters.description: Time (in seconds) after which the media will be playedback

optional_parameters.name: Mix
optional_parameters.description: Whether the media should be mixed with the call's audio stream

optional_parameters.name: Loop
optional_parameters.description: Loops the media file(s) indefinitely

optional_parameters.name: Legs
optional_parameters.description: Call leg(s) for which the media will be played; `aleg` refers to the initial call leg, `bleg` refers to the bridged call leg, if applicable.

optional_parameters.name: Length
optional_parameters.description: Maximum amount of time (in seconds) to playback the media

enum: Length Parameter must be a positive integer

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

SchedPlayId.description: Unique identifier of the scheduled playback request (UUIDv4)

api_list.name: /v0.1/SoundTouch/
api_list.description: Applies SoundTouch effects to a live call

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call to send DTMF to

optional_parameters.name: PitchSemiTones
optional_parameters.description: Adjust the pitch in semitones

optional_parameters.name: Rate
optional_parameters.description: Adjust the rate

optional_parameters.name: PitchOctaves
optional_parameters.description: Adjust the pitch in octaves

optional_parameters.name: Pitch
optional_parameters.description: Adjust the pitch

optional_parameters.name: AudioDirection
optional_parameters.description: Media stream to be altered, incoming or outgoing

optional_parameters.name: Tempo
optional_parameters.description: Adjust the tempo

enum: PitchSemiTones Parameter must be between -14 and 14
PitchOctaves Parameter must be between -1 and 1

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/SoundTouchStop/
api_list.description: Removes SoundTouch effects from a given call

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/TransferCall/
api_list.description: Replaces the RestXML flow of a live call

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call

required_parameters.name: Url
required_parameters.description: Absolute URL which will return the updated RestXML flow

enum: Transfer Call Failed -- Call not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/HangupCall/
api_list.description: Hangs up a specific call

optional_parameters.name: CallUUID
optional_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call (when established); this parameter is mutually exclusive with RequestUUID

optional_parameters.name: RequestUUID
optional_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the API request (when the call is not established yet); this parameter is mutually exclusive with CallUUID

enum: CallUUID or RequestUUID Parameter must be present
Both CallUUID and RequestUUID Parameters cannot be present

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/Play/
api_list.description: Plays media into a live call

required_parameters.name: Sounds
required_parameters.description: Comma separated list of file paths/URIs to be played

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call to play media into

optional_parameters.name: Length
optional_parameters.description: Maximum amount of time (in seconds) to playback the media

optional_parameters.name: Loop
optional_parameters.description: Loops the media file(s) indefinitely

optional_parameters.name: Mix
optional_parameters.description: Whether the media should be mixed with the call's audio stream

optional_parameters.name: Legs
optional_parameters.description: Call leg(s) for which the media will be played; `aleg` refers to the initial call leg, `bleg` refers to the bridged call leg, if applicable.

enum: Length Parameter must be a positive integer

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/PlayStop/
api_list.description: Interrupts media playback on a given call

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/Call/
api_list.description: Initiates an outbound call

required_parameters.name: AnswerUrl
required_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL which will provide the RestXML once the call connects

required_parameters.name: Gateways
required_parameters.description: Comma separated FreeSWITCH gateway strings. When multiple gateways are specified, they will be tried sequentially (failover)

required_parameters.name: From
required_parameters.description: Phone number to be used as Caller ID

required_parameters.name: To
required_parameters.description: Phone number to be called

optional_parameters.name: RingUrl
optional_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL to which the call ringing notification will be POSTed. `RequestUUID` and `CallUUID` is added to the usual [call notification parameters](#/components/schemas/CallNotificationParameters)

optional_parameters.name: CallerName
optional_parameters.description: Caller Name to be set for the call

optional_parameters.name: GatewayCodecs
optional_parameters.description: List of codec(s) to be used for each gateway. Enclose codec groups in single quotes

optional_parameters.name: SendOnPreanswer
optional_parameters.description: When set to `true`, DTMF tones will be sent as early media rather than when the call is answered

optional_parameters.name: HangupOnRing
optional_parameters.description: Schedules the call's hangup at a given time offset (in seconds) after the destination starts ringing

optional_parameters.name: SendDigits
optional_parameters.description: DTMF tones to be sent when the call is answered. Each occurrence of `w` implies a 0.5 seconds delay whereas `W` will apply a whole second delay. To alter the tone duration (by default, 2000ms), append `@` and the length in milliseconds at the end of the string

optional_parameters.name: GatewayTimeouts
optional_parameters.description: List of maximum timeout amounts (in seconds) for each gateway

optional_parameters.name: ExtraDialString
optional_parameters.description: Additional [channel variables](https://freeswitch.org/confluence/display/FREESWITCH/Channel+Variables) to be added to the originate FreeSWITCH API call.

optional_parameters.name: HangupUrl
optional_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL to which the call hangup notification will be POSTed. `HangupCause` is added to the usual call [call notification parameters](#/components/schemas/CallNotificationParameters)

optional_parameters.name: TimeLimit
optional_parameters.description: Schedules the call's hangup at a given time offset (in seconds) after the call is answered

optional_parameters.name: GatewayRetries
optional_parameters.description: List of maximum retry counts for each gateway

optional_parameters.name: CoreUUID
optional_parameters.description: Core UUID of the desired FreeSWITCH instance (an Eqivo extension)

RequestUUID.description: Unique identifier of the Call request (UUIDv4)

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

RestApiServer.description: API server which handled this request (an Eqivo extension)

api_list.name: /v0.1/RecordStart/
api_list.description: Initiates recording of a given call

optional_parameters.name: FileName
optional_parameters.description: Recording file name (without extension); if empty, a timestamp based file name will be generated

optional_parameters.name: FilePath
optional_parameters.description: Directory path/URI where the recording file will be saved

optional_parameters.name: TimeLimit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum recording length, in seconds

optional_parameters.name: FileFormat
optional_parameters.description: File format (extension)

optional_parameters.name: CallUUID
optional_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call to be recorded

RecordFile.description: Directory path/URI where the recording file will be saved

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/SendDigits/
api_list.description: Emits DMTF tones to a call

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call to send DTMF to

required_parameters.name: Digits
required_parameters.description: DTMF tones to be sent; each occurrence of `w` implies a 0.5 seconds delay whereas `W` will apply a whole second delay. To alter the tone duration (by default, 2000ms), append `@` and the length in milliseconds at the end of the string

optional_parameters.name: Leg
optional_parameters.description: Call leg(s) to which DTMFs will be sent; `aleg` refers to the initial call leg, `bleg` refers to the bridged call leg, if applicable.

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferencePlay/
api_list.description: Plays media to one or more conference members

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

required_parameters.name: MemberID
required_parameters.description: List of comma separated member IDs to be affected; `all` shorthand is available too.

required_parameters.name: FilePath
required_parameters.description: Path/URI of the media file to be played

enum: Conference Play Failed -- Conference not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceList/
api_list.description: Returns a list of all established conferences

optional_parameters.name: MutedFilter
optional_parameters.description: Restricts listed members to muted ones

optional_parameters.name: DeafFilter
optional_parameters.description: Restricts listed members to deaf ones

optional_parameters.name: CallUUIDFilter
optional_parameters.description: Restricts listed calls to the provided values (comma separated call UUID list)

optional_parameters.name: MemberFilter
optional_parameters.description: Restricts listed members to the provided values (comma separated member ID list)

enum: Conference List Failed to parse result

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/BulkCall/
api_list.description: Initiates multiple concurrent outbound calls

required_parameters.name: AnswerUrl
required_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL which will provide the RestXML once the call connects

required_parameters.name: To
required_parameters.description: Phone number to be called

required_parameters.name: Delimiter
required_parameters.description: Any character, except `/` and `,`, which will be used as a separator within several parameters

required_parameters.name: From
required_parameters.description: Phone number to be used as Caller ID

required_parameters.name: Gateways
required_parameters.description: Comma separated FreeSWITCH gateway strings. When multiple gateways are specified, they will be tried sequentially (failover)

optional_parameters.name: CallerName
optional_parameters.description: Caller Name to be set for the call

optional_parameters.name: HangupUrl
optional_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL to which the call hangup notification will be POSTed. `HangupCause` is added to the usual call [call notification parameters](#/components/schemas/CallNotificationParameters)

optional_parameters.name: GatewayRetries
optional_parameters.description: List of maximum retry counts for each gateway

optional_parameters.name: CoreUUID
optional_parameters.description: Core UUID of the desired FreeSWITCH instance (an Eqivo extension)

optional_parameters.name: ExtraDialString
optional_parameters.description: Additional [channel variables](https://freeswitch.org/confluence/display/FREESWITCH/Channel+Variables) to be added to the originate FreeSWITCH API call.

optional_parameters.name: SendOnPreanswer
optional_parameters.description: When set to `true`, DTMF tones will be sent as early media rather than when the call is answered

optional_parameters.name: RingUrl
optional_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL to which the call ringing notification will be POSTed. `RequestUUID` and `CallUUID` is added to the usual [call notification parameters](#/components/schemas/CallNotificationParameters)

optional_parameters.name: SendDigits
optional_parameters.description: DTMF tones to be sent when the call is answered. Each occurrence of `w` implies a 0.5 seconds delay whereas `W` will apply a whole second delay. To alter the tone duration (by default, 2000ms), append `@` and the length in milliseconds at the end of the string

optional_parameters.name: ConfirmSound
optional_parameters.description: Remote URL to fetch with POST HTTP request which must return a RestXML with Play, Wait and/or Speak Elements only (all others are ignored). This RESTXML is played to the called party when he answered

optional_parameters.name: GatewayCodecs
optional_parameters.description: List of codec(s) to be used for each gateway. Enclose codec groups in single quotes

optional_parameters.name: GatewayTimeouts
optional_parameters.description: List of maximum timeout amounts (in seconds) for each gateway

optional_parameters.name: RejectCauses
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated reject causes

optional_parameters.name: ConfirmKey
optional_parameters.description: DTMF tone the called party must send to accept the call

optional_parameters.name: HangupOnRing
optional_parameters.description: Schedules the call's hangup at a given time offset (in seconds) after the destination starts ringing

optional_parameters.name: TimeLimit
optional_parameters.description: Schedules the call's hangup at a given time offset (in seconds) after the call is answered

enum: BulkCalls should be used for at least 2 numbers
'To' parameter length does not match 'Gateways' Length

RequestUUID.description: Unique identifiers of each Call request (UUIDv4)

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

RestApiServer.description: API server which handled this request (an Eqivo extension)

api_list.name: /v0.1/CancelScheduledPlay/
api_list.description: Cancels a scheduled playback request

required_parameters.name: SchedPlayId
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier returned when scheduled playback was originally requested

enum: Scheduled Play Cancelation Failed -- ID not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/GroupCall/

required_parameters.name: To

required_parameters.name: Gateways
required_parameters.description: Comma separated FreeSWITCH gateway strings. When multiple gateways are specified, they will be tried sequentially (failover)

required_parameters.name: From
required_parameters.description: Phone number to be used as Caller ID

required_parameters.name: AnswerUrl
required_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL which will provide the RestXML once the call connects

required_parameters.name: Delimiter
required_parameters.description: Any character, except `/` and `,`, which will be used as a separator within several parameters

optional_parameters.name: ConfirmSound
optional_parameters.description: Remote URL to fetch with POST HTTP request which must return a RestXML with Play, Wait and/or Speak Elements only (all others are ignored). This RESTXML is played to the called party when he answered

optional_parameters.name: GatewayTimeouts
optional_parameters.description: List of maximum timeout amounts (in seconds) for each gateway

optional_parameters.name: RejectCauses
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated reject causes

optional_parameters.name: RingUrl
optional_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL to which the call ringing notification will be POSTed. `RequestUUID` and `CallUUID` is added to the usual [call notification parameters](#/components/schemas/CallNotificationParameters)

optional_parameters.name: GatewayRetries
optional_parameters.description: List of maximum retry counts for each gateway

optional_parameters.name: GatewayCodecs
optional_parameters.description: List of codec(s) to be used for each gateway. Enclose codec groups in single quotes

optional_parameters.name: SendOnPreanswer
optional_parameters.description: When set to `true`, DTMF tones will be sent as early media rather than when the call is answered

optional_parameters.name: ExtraDialString
optional_parameters.description: Additional [channel variables](https://freeswitch.org/confluence/display/FREESWITCH/Channel+Variables) to be added to the originate FreeSWITCH API call.

optional_parameters.name: SendDigits
optional_parameters.description: DTMF tones to be sent when the call is answered. Each occurrence of `w` implies a 0.5 seconds delay whereas `W` will apply a whole second delay. To alter the tone duration (by default, 2000ms), append `@` and the length in milliseconds at the end of the string

optional_parameters.name: ConfirmKey
optional_parameters.description: DTMF tone the called party must send to accept the call

optional_parameters.name: CoreUUID
optional_parameters.description: Core UUID of the desired FreeSWITCH instance (an Eqivo extension)

optional_parameters.name: CallerName
optional_parameters.description: Caller Name to be set for the call

optional_parameters.name: HangupOnRing
optional_parameters.description: Schedules the call's hangup at a given time offset (in seconds) after the destination starts ringing

optional_parameters.name: TimeLimit
optional_parameters.description: Schedules the call's hangup at a given time offset (in seconds) after the call is answered

optional_parameters.name: HangupUrl
optional_parameters.description: Fully qualified URL to which the call hangup notification will be POSTed. `HangupCause` is added to the usual call [call notification parameters](#/components/schemas/CallNotificationParameters)

enum: GroupCall should be used for at least 2 numbers
'To' parameter length does not match 'Gateways' Length

RequestUUID.description: Unique identifier of the Call request (UUIDv4)

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

RestApiServer.description: API server which handled this request (an Eqivo extension)

api_list.name: /v0.1/HangupAllCalls/
api_list.description: Hangs up all established calls
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eqivo-telephony.p.rapidapi.com/v0.1/HangupAllCalls/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eqivo-telephony.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://eqivo-telephony.p.rapidapi.com/v0.1/HangupAllCalls/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eqivo-telephony.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ScheduleHangup/
api_list.description: Schedules a hangup for a specific call

required_parameters.name: CallUUID
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier of the call

required_parameters.name: Time
required_parameters.description: Time (in seconds) after which the call in question will be hung up

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

SchedHangupId.description: Unique identifier of the scheduled hangup request (UUIDv4)

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceUnmute/
api_list.description: Restores audio from one or more conference members

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

required_parameters.name: MemberID
required_parameters.description: List of comma separated member IDs to be affected; `all` shorthand is available too.

enum: Conference Unmute Failed -- Conference not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceUndeaf/

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

required_parameters.name: MemberID
required_parameters.description: List of comma separated member IDs to be affected; `all` shorthand is available too.

enum: Conference Undeaf Failed -- Conference not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceHangup/

required_parameters.name: MemberID
required_parameters.description: List of comma separated member IDs to be affected; `all` shorthand is available too.

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

enum: Conference Hangup Failed -- Conference not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceRecordStart/
api_list.description: Initiates a conference recording

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

optional_parameters.name: FileFormat
optional_parameters.description: File format (extension)

optional_parameters.name: FilePath
optional_parameters.description: Directory path/URI where the recording file will be saved

optional_parameters.name: FileName
optional_parameters.description: Recording file name (without extension); if empty, a timestamp based file name will be generated

enum: Conference RecordStart Failed -- Conference not found

RecordFile.description: Directory path/URI where the recording file will be saved

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceKick/
api_list.description: Kicks one or more conference members

required_parameters.name: MemberID
required_parameters.description: List of comma separated member IDs to be affected; `all` shorthand is available too.

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

enum: Conference Kick Failed -- Conference not found

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceMute/
api_list.description: Blocks audio from one or more conference members

required_parameters.name: MemberID
required_parameters.description: List of comma separated member IDs to be affected; `all` shorthand is available too.

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

enum: Conference Mute Failed -- Conference not found

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceListMembers/
api_list.description: Retrieves the member list for a given conference

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference

optional_parameters.name: MemberFilter
optional_parameters.description: Restricts listed members to the provided values (comma separated member ID list)

optional_parameters.name: MutedFilter
optional_parameters.description: Restricts listed members to muted ones

optional_parameters.name: CallUUIDFilter
optional_parameters.description: Restricts listed calls to the provided values (comma separated call UUID list)

optional_parameters.name: DeafFilter
optional_parameters.description: Restricts listed members to deaf ones

enum: Conference ListMembers Failed to parse result
Conference ListMembers Failed -- Conference not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceSpeak/

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

required_parameters.name: MemberID
required_parameters.description: List of comma separated member IDs to be affected; `all` shorthand is available too.

enum: Conference Speak Failed -- Conference not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not

api_list.name: /v0.1/ConferenceDeaf/

required_parameters.name: MemberID
required_parameters.description: List of comma separated member IDs to be affected; `all` shorthand is available too.

required_parameters.name: ConferenceName
required_parameters.description: Name of the conference in question

enum: Conference Deaf Failed -- Conference not found

Success.description: Whether the request was successful or not
